short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This is an extension based around pranking your friends.  You can escape it by typing '\g' at the end of your search.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension is based around causing harmless fun with your friends.  It will redirect any Google search to the second page of the Bing search for that same result.  You can escape this by adding "\g" to the end of your search result.
